message.content:
I need to identify the value of carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statement, the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically represented by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item in the income statement.

From the income statement provided, I can see:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 10400000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

The Cost of Goods Sold represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

Therefore, the value I'm looking for is 10,400,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '10400000.00'} }
```
